EmailTemplate.name: 06-01-21 BNK PFDFW Phase 2 Email 3.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Missed the NCR’s presentation at the Google Cloud Financial Services Summit? Watch the Replay Here
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Want to know how to best accelerate your digital transformation at your financial institution? Then catch up on last week’s Google Cloud Financial Services Summit, where some of the financial world’s brightest minds came together to discuss how to tackle the challenges facing the industry and accelerate business performance. Watch the replay of NCR’s session where CTO Tim Vanderham share insights and real-world examples of how FIs are using technology to transform their financial institution. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
